Services
Hospice
Hospice in Palm Coast
Hospice Where Comfort Comes First
When someone you love needs hospice care, we’re here to support you every step of the way — physically, mentally and spiritually. Located in the heart of downtown Palm Coast, our AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway hospital brings hospice care services closer to home.
Our hospice team will work with you and your family to develop a personalized plan that helps your loved one make the most of each day with dignity, comfort and support. From pain management to spiritual counseling to help make transitions and end-of-life care more manageable, we’ll guide your loved one and your family.
Learn More
about "Hospice in Palm Coast"
Call for Assistance 386-231-6555
Hospice That Makes Every Day Meaningful
6 items. To interact with these items, press Control-Option-Shift-Right Arrow
Expand All
Collapse All
When to Begin Hospice
We know the decision to begin hospice care can be emotional. But you and your loved one will never be alone. Our team will help you make informed decisions about your loved one’s care.
Signs it might be time for hospice care include:
Decline in physical and mental status
Difficulty swallowing or breathing
Difficulty with most daily activities
Frequent hospitalizations or emergency room visits
Multiple medical problems or diagnoses
Profound weakness or fatigue
Recurrent edema (swelling)
Repeat infections, like pneumonia, bronchitis or urinary tract infections
Shortness of breath or chest pain
Steady weight loss
Uncontrolled pain or vomiting
Weakness and fatigue
Learn more about AdventHealth Hospice Care
here
.
Resources to Support You
At AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway, we have resources that address, and even strengthen, every aspect of your loved one’s care. We have a team of committed providers, including our
Palm Coast senior care
physicians, specialized hospice staff, bereavement counselors and your loved one’s primary care physician.
To help you plan for the days ahead, our hospice services include:
24-hour on-call medical staff and nurse support
Advanced care planning
Caregiver support
Educational resources
Grief support
Inpatient unit and services
Life legacies program
Medication, supplies and medical equipment
Pain management
Pet therapy
Care for the Entire Family
Spending time with family can be just as important to a person’s well-being as any other part of their care. Whether at home, at our inpatient unit or in a nursing home, your loved one deserves to find the joy in each day. And you can count on our hospice nurses to care for your entire family with tireless compassion, so you can make every moment count.
Hospice Volunteers
Our volunteers are at the heart of our hospice care, volunteering their time, talents, unique expertise and compassion to support you and your loved one. And since many even spend time in the homes of patients and families, we go to great lengths to ensure every volunteer is right for this type of work.
Volunteers must obtain medical clearance, in addition to passing a background check and the Hospice Care Volunteer Training Certification program, which includes understanding hospice, confidentiality, working with families, listening skills, signs and symptoms of approaching death, loss and grief and bereavement support.
Volunteers provide patients and families with a wide array of services, including:
Inpatient support
at our inpatient hospice care facilities
Practical assistance
, from providing companionship or a listening ear to sharing hobbies and reading to patients
Respite
care
that may involve running errands, staying with a patient to relieve family members, preparing light meals or helping with housework
Vigil presence
: throughout an illness, and when the patient is passing, it can be a comfort to have someone to sit in vigil quietly at the bedside, to hold a hand or whisper words of comfort
As integral parts of our hospice care team, our volunteers can help create a peaceful atmosphere for families to share stories about their loved one or help them say goodbye. At every step of your loved one’s care, you’ll be surrounded with support.
Special Services
As part of our hospice care program, we offer these special services:
Friends with Flowers
Hospice care volunteers create flower arrangements for our inpatient units and Palm Coast nursing home facilities. These flowers are donated by a local floral wholesaler and other area florists.
Life Legacies
Everyone has a story to tell, and Life Legacies gives our hospice care patients the opportunity to record theirs to share with future generations.
Pet Programs
We know that your loved one’s pets are part of the family, which is why we offer these pet-centered programs as part of our hospice care program:
Pet Partners
Pets have the ability to uplift our spirits in the most authentic way. Unique to AdventHealth Hospice Care, HospoochCare and HospussCare provide patients with a visit from our Pet Partners team. This program brings volunteers and their trained therapy animals to patients to ensure they don’t feel isolated, to stimulate communication and to improve emotional and social health.
Pet Peace of Mind Program
The Pet Peace of Mind Program is designed to support pets while their owners are receiving hospice care services. Pet Peace of Mind Program volunteers may assist with food, litter and the basic veterinary care that patients desperately need for their pets. This may include:
Basic in-home care
Dog walking
Financial assistance with routine care
Flea and tick treatment
Pet waste clean-up
Transportation to veterinary care or groomers
Contact our Pet Peace of Mind Program coordinator at
866-582-6731
for more information.

A Network of Compassionate Hospice Experts
Our AdventHealth nationwide network of hospice care provides the hospice services your family needs, including pain management and quality of life care — all so you and your loved one can enjoy moments together. With an expert team of doctors, nurses and chaplains, we care for your loved one with grace and dignity.

Services
Surgical Care
Palm Coast Surgery
Request an Appointment
Surgical Specialties
Find Doctors
Español
View Page Navigation
Your Surgical Care Is
Our Top Priority
Sometimes surgery is necessary when you’re facing an illness or health condition. Surgeons mend injuries, help their fellow doctors pinpoint disease and provide much-needed relief from pain. If surgery is on your schedule, have faith; you’re in capable hands. Our caring team at our AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway hospital will ensure you feel heard, supported and respected at every step in the surgical process.
From minor outpatient procedures to more complex surgeries, we consider conservative measures first and use minimally invasive surgical techniques whenever possible. Here, you’ll have access to leading-edge technology and procedures delivered with compassionate care.
We’re here to help you find the right surgeon or a location that’s convenient for you.
Request an Appointment
Hide
Flagler County’s Home
for Surgical Expertise
3 items. To interact with these items, press Control-Option-Shift-Right Arrow
Expand All
Collapse All
Leading-Edge Technology for Better Surgical Outcomes
It’s normal to feel anxious heading into surgery. But you can rest easy knowing our expert team of surgical specialists wants to help you get back to your everyday life.
From our orthopedic surgery program to laparoscopic procedures, it’s our goal to help you reclaim the active life you desire. Whether that means minimally invasive surgery using the latest technology or a major
cardiovascular surgery
like a bypass, you’ll have access to a range of options, including:
Innovative endoscopic procedures
to treat a broad spectrum of gastrointestinal conditions
Robotic-assisted surgeries
for a minimally invasive approach to more complex procedures, including gynecological and urological procedures
Specialized suites
for performing complex orthopedic procedures like joint replacements
An Expert Team Working Together for You
Our team of highly trained medical professionals collaborates across disciplines to care for every aspect of your health, in body, mind and spirit. From diagnosis to surgery and rehabilitation, you can count on us to be by your side.
Our dedicated surgeons are skilled in these and other areas:
Cardiovascular surgery
General surgery
Gynecological surgery
Orthopedic surgery
Podiatry
Thoracic surgery
Urologic surgery
Women’s surgical care
Whatever your needs, we’re here to meet them, and we’re ready to introduce you to the expert care team that will guide you on your path to better health.
Comforting Care Centered Around You
We believe tending to your physical needs is only part of the recovery solution; your mental and spiritual health are equally important. With an emphasis on whole-person healing, we strive to provide exceptional medical care and help you feel supported through every step of your journey.
Family and friends are important to your healing process, so they may
visit anytime
during your hospital stay after surgery. Our pastoral team is also available whenever you need someone to listen, pray with you or offer a hand to hold. When it’s time to return home, we’ll provide you with every next step. You never have to wonder what’s ahead. It’s our privilege to provide comprehensive, whole-person care at every stage of your wellness journey.
Expand All
Collapse All
Caring Surgeons
You Can Count On
When you need advanced surgical care, rely on our expert surgeons to provide the whole-person care you need.
Find a Doctor
From Pre-Op to Post-Op,
Expect Constant Support
Facing surgery, whether it’s an emergency or elective, may feel daunting. But we’ll be there for every step. Our multidisciplinary approach to care ensures you will be fully supported before and after your procedure. From connecting you with resources and support groups to providing rehab programs if necessary, it’s our goal to help you feel better long after you leave our surgical center.
Request an Appointment

Services
Gastroenterology Care
Gastroenterology Care in Palm Coast
Request an Appointment
Treatments
Find Doctors
Español
View Page Navigation
Digestive Expertise to
Feel Whole Again
Opening our AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway hospital is our way of bringing comprehensive gastroenterology care to your neighborhood. Because it’s all about serving you where you feel best.
Knowing that conditions related to digestion can make daily life more challenging, our dedicated gastroenterologists are ready to help you manage your condition and get back to the life you love.
We’re here to help you find the right gastroenterologist or a location that’s convenient for you.
Request an Appointment
Hide
Digestive Care You Can Trust,
Now Just Steps From Home

Specialists Who Care About Your Digestive Health
Your digestive health is in good hands. Our compassionate and skilled gastroenterologists, specialized nurses and support teams are equipped with the knowledge, technology and advanced treatment options to deliver care that will get you back to the life you love.
We specialize in the treatment of digestive disorders, including chronic conditions like celiac disease, irritable bowel syndrome and Crohn’s disease. And because the first step of your wellness journey is a fast and accurate diagnosis, we use advanced diagnostic technology, including:
Colonoscopy
Diagnostic cancer screenings
Diagnostic fluoroscopy
Diagnostic radiology
Endoscopy
Digestive Issues We Treat
Digestive disorders often have similar symptoms, but very different outcomes. That’s why it’s important for you to meet with an expert when you first start experiencing symptoms.
We diagnose and offer treatments for an extensive range of disorders and gastrointestinal diseases, including:
Anorectal disorders
Appendicitis
Barrett’s esophagus
Benign colon disease
Celiac disease
Crohn's disease
Diverticulosis and diverticulitis
Gallbladder disease
Gastroesophageal reflux disease, or GERD
Hemorrhoids
Hernia
Liver diseases
Inflammatory bowel disease
Irritable bowel syndrome
Ulcerative colitis
Stomach ulcers
Leading Care for Barrett’s Esophagus
Barrett’s esophagus can be painful and increases your risk of developing esophageal cancer. But it can be treated, and our dedicated gastroenterologists in Palm Coast are here to help with treatment options like the Halo procedure. This innovative and minimally invasive care technique ensures a shorter recovery time and a lower risk of complications than traditional procedures. Here, your comfort and wellness are our priority.
Innovative Treatments
Whether your digestive disorder can be cared for at home or requires a procedure, you can trust the compassionate care team at our hospital to help you make informed treatment decisions.
Since you want to get back to your normal routine as soon as possible, we use minimally invasive procedures when we can, so you can benefit from shorter recovery times and less scarring. These include robotic-assisted and laparoscopic procedures.
Here, you can expect the very best in digestive and endoscopy care from a highly credentialed and experienced staff. At our fully equipped endoscopy suites, we use leading techniques to care for digestive problems, including:
Abdominal resection
Argon plasma tissue coagulation
Colonoscopy
Doppler-guided hemorrhoid therapy
Endoscopic foreign body removal
Endoscopic retrograde cholangiopancreatography (ERCP)
Esophageal and biliary dilation and stenting
Esophagogastroduodenoscopy
Fluoroscopy
Gallbladder removal
Hernia surgery
Rectal cancer surgery
Stomach, rectal and colon polypectomy
Therapeutic radiology interventional support
Thermal ablation
Proactive Care With Preventive Screenings
Staying on the path to wellness is easier with a proactive approach to care. Our digestive health specialists at AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway will guide you with regular health checkups, including preventive gastrointestinal cancer screenings.

Information For Visitors
Caring for Your Loved One
Caring for You
Thank you for caring. The presence of loved ones does wonders for our patients’ hearts and minds, helping them feel better even when they’re not feeling well. Whether you’re just popping in on your lunch break or staying for a few hours, know that your visit makes a difference. That’s why we do everything to make it easy for friends and family to visit loved ones during their stay at AdventHealth Dade City, formerly Florida Hospital Dade City.
When someone enters our care, we don’t just look after them. We also look out for their friends and family. The following resources and information for visitors can help make your time at our hospital easier and less stressful.
You Care. So Do We.
Resources and Information for Visitors
Everything you need for an easier, more convenient visit to AdventHealth Dade City, formerly Florida Hospital Dade City, is just a click away. Need anything else? Just ask. We’re here for you.
Map
Visiting Hours
Events
Caring for Those Who Care
Visitor Services
3 items. To interact with these items, press Control-Option-Shift-Right Arrow
Expand All
Collapse All
Hospital Amenities
We offer a number of hospital amenities to make your visit more comfortable and convenient.
Food and Drink
Our cafeteria provides patients and their guests healthy, delicious meal options, including vegetarian selections and a fresh fruit and salad bar. Hot coffee and other beverages are also available.
Hours
The cafeteria serves breakfast and lunch seven days per week.
Vending machines offering beverages and snacks are located next to the cafeteria and are available 24 hours a day, seven days a week, for your convenience.
Directions
AdventHealth Dade City provides easy access for patients and visitors from the surrounding community and those farther away in Bushnell, Webster, Ridge Manor, Spring Hill, and Brooksville.
Our address:
13100 Fort King Rd.
Dade City, FL 33525
Map
Directions:
From I75:
Take Exit 285, head east on State Road 52. Take a right on Stadium Drive, then a right on Fort King Road and then a left on Medical Drive at AdventHealth Dade City.
From Sumter County:
Take U.S. 301 south, then take a right on Meridian Avenue and a left on 17th Street. 17th Street becomes Fort King Road. Take a left on Medical Drive at AdventHealth Dade City.
From Zephyrhills:
Take U.S. 301 north, then turn left on Clinton Avenue, right on Fort King Road and right on Medical Drive at AdventHealth Dade City.
Pastoral Care
We understand how stressful a hospital visit can be for the people in our care as well as their friends and family. That’s why our non-denominational hospital chapel is open 24/7 to all patients and visitors. And our Spiritual Care team is also always available to provide a listening ear and a shoulder to lean on. We’re also more than happy to connect you with your local faith community.
Some of the pastoral care services we provide include:
End-of-life care and bereavement support for patients, family members, and staff
Monthly suicide survivors support group
No One Dies Alone program for end-of-life patients without local support
Patient and family visitation, supportive listening, and prayer and sacramental services, including communion and anointing of the sick
Spiritual and emotional support following hospital or community disasters
Weekly prayer service
To arrange for a pastoral care visit, simply call the hospital operator at
Call
352-351-7200
.

Collapse All

Our Spiritual Care Hotline
Whatever you're facing, you're not alone. When you need a listening ear, the AdventHealth Spiritual Care Hotline is here for you at
Call
833-258-2414
, Monday through Thursday, from 9:30 am to 5:30 pm ET and Friday from 9:30 am to 3 pm. Calls are free and confidential, and our caring team members will listen without judgment, offering prayer, support and additional resources, if needed.
Call Now

Your Spot for
Superior Imaging Services
Imaging care is now even easier to access at AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway in downtown Palm Coast. Medical imaging is more than just a picture. It’s a confirmation that your tender ankle is actually broken. It’s the prevention of a heart attack with cardiac CT imaging. It’s seeing the whole you, inside and out.
Using sophisticated equipment and the combined efforts of radiologists, imaging technicians and other care team members, we’ll tend to your needs and help you make informed care decisions.
We’re here to help you find the right imaging service or a location that’s convenient for you.

Advanced Screenings, Tests and Treatments
With a team of diagnostic specialists and a range of routine and minimally invasive imaging services, you can now find the care you need, right here in downtown Palm Coast. Our imaging and radiology services include:
Computed tomography (CT scan):
scans that can detect tumors, internal bleeding, fractures, and certain types of disease
Diagnostic X-rays
: images of your body’s inner tissues and structures that help us examine broken bones and fractures
Fluoroscopy:
another form of X-ray that creates a continuous moving image in real time
Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI):
a radiation-free diagnostic test that takes detailed pictures of organs, soft tissues and bones
Nuclear medicine with SPECT-CT scanning:
the safe use of radioactive substances combined with CT to diagnose conditions like cancer, heart disease and neurological disorders
Ultrasounds:
images (created by sound waves) of the body’s internal tissues and organs, which help diagnose diseases, as well as take pictures of a baby inside the womb
Prepare for Your Visit: What to Expect
To help you feel at ease, our imaging team will help you understand what to expect during your CT scan, MRI or other imaging procedure. We’ll get to know you, too, from gathering your medical history to asking whether you experience anxiety in confined spaces.
Most imaging tests take 30 minutes to an hour. Before your screening or diagnostic exam, we may ask you to change into a gown or scrubs and to remove any electronic devices or metal jewelry. To get a clearer look inside your body, we may also have you drink a liquid called a contrast or a radiotracer. You can trust that all our imaging tests are either non-invasive or minimally invasive — and that we’ll guide you from start to finish, doing our best to make you feel comfortable and safe.
Once your exam is over, we’ll evaluate your images and deliver your results to your provider as promptly as possible.

Support
Our multidisciplinary care team offers various imaging services at locations convenient to you. We work to get you results quickly so you can get the care you need. We’re also here to connect you with resources and to help overcome roadblocks — whether it’s helping you find a ride home after an imaging appointment or connecting you with support groups for people who share your diagnosis. Because to us, it’s not just about healing your body; it’s caring for all parts of you: easing your mind, lifting your spirit and getting you back to feeling whole.

Let’s Champion Your Health,
Together
When you think of Daytona International Speedway
®
, you think of the leader in racing and family entertainment. And when you think of health care, you look to AdventHealth as your trusted health experts. Together, our shared belief in the importance of family, tradition and faith inspires fans to reach their highest potential.
Whether it’s pitting for fuel, taking the checkered flag or braving the unknown, AdventHealth is committed to you every step of the way. From our experienced physicians to our compassionate staff, AdventHealth is dedicated to your lifelong well-being and complete health — in body, mind and spirit. For over a century, AdventHealth has gone beyond symptoms and treatment, helping people live happier, healthier lives.
AdventHealth is a proud partner of Daytona International Speedway
®
— and official champion of the human spirit.
A Champion On and Off the Track:
Erik Jones
Whether he’s racing a car at 200 miles per hour or reading books to children, Erik Jones strives to make a difference both on and off the track.
He holds the record as NASCAR’s youngest Truck Series champion and has claimed victories in the Southern 500 at Darlington Raceway (in South Carolina) and Daytona International Speedway. Jones drives the iconic No. 43 made famous by Richard Petty, “The King."
Off the racetrack, Jones's influence extends into the community, and his partnership with AdventHealth will enhance how he shares his values of a healthy and balanced lifestyle with others. In 2020, the Erik Jones Foundation was founded on the pillars of changing lives by igniting children’s passion for reading, promoting early cancer detection and care, and advocating for animal welfare. Jones's commitment to making a positive impact resonates beyond the racing world.
Your Care Network for Life
Your whole health is backed by the AdventHealth network of care with seamless and connected health care services for all ages. Six hospitals, an experienced team of physicians and specialists, emergency and urgent care centers, and a wide range of medical and diagnostic offerings are here to champion your health — in body, mind and spirit.
To access your health care with ease, the AdventHealth network of care also offers the convenience of virtual physician visits, online scheduling, care coordinators and a patient portal to retrieve health records, review test results and fill prescriptions — all in one location.
Nationally
Recognized
For more than 100 years, AdventHealth has been delivering world-class health care. As nationally recognized medical leaders in cancer, cardiac, children's and women's care, our continued dedication to push medical boundaries offers hope to someday cure the incurable.
Take It From the Drivers:
Onsite Care Counts
Together, LEGACY M.C. and AdventHealth form one powerful partnership focused on good health and great sports for the pros and fans alike. Hear NASCAR drivers Richard Petty, Jimmie Johnson and Erik Jones discuss the importance of the AdventHealth Care Center at The World Center of Racing.

Home Health
Palm Coast Parkway Home Health
Dependable Health Care,
Right in Your Home
At AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway, our care can extend into your home to provide therapy, post-surgical care and more. With our in-home care services, you can enjoy a shorter hospital stay, then go home and receive hospital-caliber home health care services, including home infusion therapy, physical therapy, wound care and post-surgical care.
We take extra steps to ensure that each of our home health team members is equipped with the knowledge, resources, critical thinking and compassion needed to provide the highest level of care, right inside your home. Find your way to wellness with the at-home health care you need.
Learn More About Home Health in Palm Coast
We’ll help you find the right care for your needs. Let our home health care come to you.
Contact Us for More Information

Palm Coast Parkway
Home Health Care Services
4 items. To interact with these items, press Control-Option-Shift-Right Arrow
Expand All
Collapse All
Experience the Comfort of Home Health Care
Whether you’re recovering from surgery or adjusting to life after a heart attack, you’ll always have skilled home care nurses and other health care specialists to tend to you. Our caring team members at AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway will put their expertise to work beyond our doors to help you heal confidently at home. Because reaching for wellness takes strength, you’ll have the support you need under the guidance of your physician and the coordination of licensed medical professionals.
Friendly Faces in Familiar Surroundings
At AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway, you’re cared for around the clock by an attentive team. It can be that way at home, too. Whether you just left our hospital or were referred by your physician, our home care nurses, specialists and aides are ready to help.
The range of home health care services you may be eligible to receive includes:
Advanced wound care
Post-hospitalization care
Diabetes management
Disease management and education
Heart failure management
Incontinence management
Infusion therapy
Joint recovery program
Medication management and education
Ostomy teaching
Outpatient surgery follow-up
Post-surgical care
Rehabilitation (physical, occupational and speech therapy)
You'll have the medical care you need in the comfort of the home you love, with plenty of compassion and personalization.
Licensed Health Care in Your House
We are licensed by the Agency for Health Care Administration (license #HHA215580961), certified by Medicare and accredited by The Joint Commission.
Call
866-673-3121
for more information regarding our services, or contact one of our local offices:
East Volusia or Flagler counties:
386-673-3121
West Volusia County:
386-917-5830
Qualifying for Home Health
AdventHealth Home Health accepts most insurance plans, including Medicare. Our services are available to anyone who:
Is under the care of a physician (only a Florida-licensed physician can order home health services for their patient)
Lives in Flagler or Volusia County
Is considered homebound and requires the skills of a registered nurse, physical therapist or speech-language pathologist during treatment

Dependable Health Care,
Right in Your Home
At AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway, our care can extend into your home to provide therapy, post-surgical care and more. With our in-home care services, you can enjoy a shorter hospital stay, then go home and receive hospital-caliber home health care services, including home infusion therapy, physical therapy, wound care and post-surgical care.
We take extra steps to ensure that each of our home health team members is equipped with the knowledge, resources, critical thinking and compassion needed to provide the highest level of care, right inside your home. Find your way to wellness with the at-home health care you need.
Learn More About Home Health in Palm Coast
We’ll help you find the right care for your needs. Let our home health care come to you.

Home Health Care Services

Experience the Comfort of Home Health Care
Whether you’re recovering from surgery or adjusting to life after a heart attack, you’ll always have skilled home care nurses and other health care specialists to tend to you. Our caring team members at AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway will put their expertise to work beyond our doors to help you heal confidently at home. Because reaching for wellness takes strength, you’ll have the support you need under the guidance of your physician and the coordination of licensed medical professionals.
Friendly Faces in Familiar Surroundings
At AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway, you’re cared for around the clock by an attentive team. It can be that way at home, too. Whether you just left our hospital or were referred by your physician, our home care nurses, specialists and aides are ready to help.
The range of home health care services you may be eligible to receive includes:
Advanced wound care
Post-hospitalization care
Diabetes management
Disease management and education
Heart failure management
Incontinence management
Infusion therapy
Joint recovery program
Medication management and education
Ostomy teaching
Outpatient surgery follow-up
Post-surgical care
Rehabilitation (physical, occupational and speech therapy)
You'll have the medical care you need in the comfort of the home you love, with plenty of compassion and personalization.
Licensed Health Care in Your House
We are licensed by the Agency for Health Care Administration (license #HHA215580961), certified by Medicare and accredited by The Joint Commission.
Call
866-673-3121
for more information regarding our services, or contact one of our local offices:
East Volusia or Flagler counties:
386-673-3121
West Volusia County:
386-917-5830
Qualifying for Home Health
AdventHealth Home Health accepts most insurance plans, including Medicare. Our services are available to anyone who:
Is under the care of a physician (only a Florida-licensed physician can order home health services for their patient)
Lives in Flagler or Volusia County
Is considered homebound and requires the skills of a registered nurse, physical therapist or speech-language pathologist during treatment

About this Event
This class focuses on relieving the symptoms of arthritis, pain, and enchancing overall healthy movement with Tai Chi Forms 1 &2. Participants to not need to have arthritis to benefit from the exercises that improve balance and reduce risk and fear of falling.
Forms One: 9/4/2025- 10/16/2025 Thursdays 11am- Noon
Tai Chi is safe for all abilities with or without arthitis. Tai Chi has been proven to prevent falls, increase balance and movement, and improve quality of life for participants. This form of Tai Chi can be safely progressed to each person’s needs. Meets once per week. Each session is $35, payment to be made online or by cash/check at first class.

Services
Emergency and Urgent Care
Palm Coast Parkway ER
Care at a Moment’s Notice,
Right in Your Neighborhood
We work around the clock and stand ready to tend to your immediate medical needs — whether that’s helping you reduce your pain, mend your injury or tend to your illness. And now, with emergency and stroke care in the heart of downtown, you can have peace of mind knowing that AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway is equipped to care for you when every minute counts.
If you’re experiencing a medical emergency, call 911 immediately.
Know Where To Go
Centra Care
Locations
Español
View Page Navigation
We Stay Prepared for
Every Medical Emergency
4 items. To interact with these items, press Control-Option-Shift-Right Arrow
Expand All
Collapse All
When to Head to the ER
When an accident leads to a serious or life-threatening outcome, you need emergency care you can trust, close to home. With our new Palm Coast Parkway hospital in Flagler County, help for emergencies is now nearby.
Emergency medical conditions we treat include:
Complicated fractures
Deep wounds
Difficulty breathing
Heart attack symptoms (chest pain, nausea, shoulder pain)
Major head injury
Poisoning
Severe allergic reactions
Severe burns
Stroke symptoms (numbness, weakness, sudden confusion, dizziness)
Vomiting or coughing up blood
What to Expect in Our ER
Because we know that a medical emergency can feel overwhelming — and that you heal best when you feel properly informed and supported — our Palm Coast Parkway ER team will take care to give you a clear sense of what's happening and answer any questions you may have.
We need information, too, because the more we know, the better we can serve you. We’ll start with the basics, like your name, birth date, medical history and the reason for your visit. We’ll also take your vital signs and then determine how best to proceed.
Our 24-hour emergency room operates through a process known as triage, which means we prioritize care for patients in critical condition. This may mean earlier treatment for a later-arriving patient, such as someone having a heart attack or stroke. But we do all we can to reduce ER wait times and get you the care you need as quickly as possible.
To help streamline your emergency care process, you may want to consider always keeping certain information in your purse or wallet. Include information like the name of your primary care physician, your insurance card, a list of your medications and drug allergies and any advance directives (like a health care proxy or power of attorney).
Urgent Care for Urgent Needs
When you don’t have a life-threatening emergency but still need care quickly, you and your family can visit AdventHealth Centra Care Palm Coast, our conveniently located
Palm Coast urgent care
center, with no appointment needed.
We accept most major insurance plans, so you can receive the highest standard of care without breaking the bank.
And because we’re committed to your whole-person care, we want to help you prevent future health concerns. For that reason, our urgent care centers in Flagler County also offer flu shots, onsite lab services, EKGs, X-rays and annual physical exams.
Our highly skilled specialists are here to help with many minor ailments, including:
Allergic reactions and hives
Cold, flu and common illnesses
Headaches and migraines
Disease management
Minor cuts (onsite stitches available)
Rashes
Sprains, strains and fractures
Stomach and digestive conditions
Video Visits for Care From Home
For non-life-threatening conditions, you can meet with a doctor or nurse practitioner on a smartphone, tablet or computer in the AdventHealth app.
Get the care you need for a number of minor ailments, including:
Conjunctivitis (pink eye)
Cough, colds, bronchitis and flu
Lower back pain
Seasonal allergies
Sinus and upper respiratory infections
Skin conditions
Urinary tract infections
How It Works
Download the AdventHealth app on
the Apple App Store
or
GooglePlay
.
Create an account.
Tap the "Request Visit" to get started.
Hours
Monday through Friday, 8 am to 8 pm
Saturday and Sunday, 8 am to 5 pm
Aftercare to Continue Healing
We want to ensure you’re on the road to healing, which is why your care may continue well after your emergency. Our care navigators will help connect you with follow-up care wherever you live, ensuring you’re supported in body, mind and spirit.

Caring for Women Through
Every Phase of Life
You take care of everyone else. Let us take care of you. At AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway, you can count on our team of OB/GYNs and other women’s health experts to support your whole health through every phase of life.
Whether you’re scheduling a routine checkup or need help connecting to a gynecologist, we’re here for you. We’ll provide the kind of care that heals your body, nourishes your mind and comforts your spirit.
We’re here to help you find the right gynecologist or a location that’s convenient for you.

We’re Here to Help You
Embrace Vibrant Health
3 items. To interact with these items, press Control-Option-Shift-Right Arrow
Expand All

Wellness Designed for You
When you care for your body, mind and spirit, you can age with confidence. We’ll provide the whole-person care you need for every age and stage of life. And if you find yourself faced with the unexpected, our specialized women’s care will help you rest easier. You’ll be in good hands with our skilled surgeons, nurses and other health care professionals — all of whom work together to deliver high-quality, compassionate care centered around you.
The Resources You Need for a Healthy Life
You deserve to feel your best. Let us help. The resources you need to stay healthy and strong are never far from home. Let our leading physicians and specialists guide you on your wellness journey. At every crossroad, we’ll meet you with expertise and compassionate care.
Best of all, you can choose from our two convenient Flagler County hospital locations — AdventHealth Palm Coast and AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway — each providing the same expert level of attentive care. It’s all part of our dedication to being there for you, no matter where life takes you.
Leading-Edge Technology for Women’s Care
When a health concern throws you off-balance, our women’s health specialists can help you find answers, ease what’s hurting and guide you toward informed choices. Feel at peace knowing we have the tools to uncover root causes, treat them and do everything possible to keep health issues from reoccurring.
We'll guide you through diagnostic care and treatment, from pelvic health and fibroid tumors to endometriosis and ovarian cysts. If surgery is the best option, trust that you’re in the most compassionate and capable hands at our surgical center.
Our physicians, gynecologists and surgeons provide the following:
Cold-knife biopsy to detect precancerous or cancerous cells
Full-service ultrasounds
Surgical services, including robotic-assisted surgery
No matter what healing measures you require, our whole-person approach provides comfort physically, mentally and spiritually.

We’ll connect you with the resources you need to live your healthiest life every day. Let us guide you, support you and be your biggest cheerleader as you enjoy a life of better health, more joy and greater confidence.

Our multidisciplinary women’s care team has you covered from that first annual visit with a gynecologist to pregnancy and postpartum and all the way through to menopause. We’ll connect you with the resources you need to live your healthiest life every day. Let us guide you, support you and be your biggest cheerleader as you enjoy a life of better health, more joy and greater confidence.

Caring for Women Through
Every Phase of Life
You take care of everyone else. Let us take care of you. At AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway, you can count on our team of OB/GYNs and other women’s health experts to support your whole health through every phase of life.
Whether you’re scheduling a routine checkup or need help connecting to a gynecologist, we’re here for you. We’ll provide the kind of care that heals your body, nourishes your mind and comforts your spirit.
We’re here to help you find the right gynecologist or a location that’s convenient for you.

Wellness Designed for You
When you care for your body, mind and spirit, you can age with confidence. We’ll provide the whole-person care you need for every age and stage of life. And if you find yourself faced with the unexpected, our specialized women’s care will help you rest easier. You’ll be in good hands with our skilled surgeons, nurses and other health care professionals — all of whom work together to deliver high-quality, compassionate care centered around you.
The Resources You Need for a Healthy Life
You deserve to feel your best. Let us help. The resources you need to stay healthy and strong are never far from home. Let our leading physicians and specialists guide you on your wellness journey. At every crossroad, we’ll meet you with expertise and compassionate care.
Best of all, you can choose from our two convenient Flagler County hospital locations — AdventHealth Palm Coast and AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway — each providing the same expert level of attentive care. It’s all part of our dedication to being there for you, no matter where life takes you.
Leading-Edge Technology for Women’s Care
When a health concern throws you off-balance, our women’s health specialists can help you find answers, ease what’s hurting and guide you toward informed choices. Feel at peace knowing we have the tools to uncover root causes, treat them and do everything possible to keep health issues from reoccurring.
We'll guide you through diagnostic care and treatment, from pelvic health and fibroid tumors to endometriosis and ovarian cysts. If surgery is the best option, trust that you’re in the most compassionate and capable hands at our surgical center.
Our physicians, gynecologists and surgeons provide the following:
Cold-knife biopsy to detect precancerous or cancerous cells
Full-service ultrasounds
Surgical services, including robotic-assisted surgery
No matter what healing measures you require, our whole-person approach provides comfort physically, mentally and spiritually.

Orthopedic Care in Downtown Palm Coast

Our Services

Español
View Page Navigation
World-Class Orthopedic Care
in Your Neighborhood
You’re doing the hard work of living an active life: riding your bike, walking the beach at sunset and nightly stretching before bed. You even joined a pickleball league. But sometimes, your bones and joints just won’t get with the program. And you feel it — all over. But help is closer than ever at our AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway hospital, right in the heart of downtown.
Our expert team of orthopedic surgeons, sports medicine specialists and care providers will help you figure out what’s going on and how to fix it, so you can get back to the active life you love.
We’re here to help you find the right orthopedic expert or a location that’s convenient for you.
Request an Appointment

Orthopedic Expertise to
Feel Better in Your Body

Expand All
Collapse All
Orthopedic Scans and Testing
No one wants to be sidelined by joint pain or a frozen shoulder. Our orthopedic clinic performs state-of-the-art imaging services like bone scans, magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) scans and X-rays to discover what may be slowing you down and how to get you back to all the activities you love, free from pain.
Common diagnostic tests and screenings we offer include:
Bone scans
Computed tomography (CT) scans
MRI scans
Ultrasounds
X-rays
Orthopedic Treatments and Services
When it hurts to move, everything is harder. Joint pain can be painful and frustrating, but we’re here to help. Whether you need
hip replacement surgery
or your carpal tunnel is flaring up again, our team is here to ease your pain and move you toward whole-person health. We bring the same exceptional care you’ve grown to expect from AdventHealth, right to downtown Palm Coast with the addition of our new orthopedic clinic.
Our extended orthopedic network delivers specialized care that meets national standards for quality and safety. With minimally invasive procedures, advanced medical technology and skilled orthopedic surgeons, we’ll guide you to a life of increased mobility and freedom from pain.
Our specialized orthopedic treatments and services include:
Achilles tendon treatment
Arthritis care
Articular cartilage
Carpal tunnel treatment
Hip replacement and resurfacing
Joint replacement education classes
Knee replacement surgery
Regenerative medicine
Robotic-assisted MAKOplasty®
Rotator cuff repairs
Shoulder replacement surgery
Sports medicine
Total ankle replacement surgery
Coordinated Orthopedic Care
You won’t walk through healing alone. We provide a network of care so you can easily find support. We offer screenings, orthopedic surgeries and free pre-surgery classes all under one roof, so you don’t have to look far to find the healing you need.
Additionally, AdventHealth Orthopedic Care Navigators are available as part of our larger network of care in the Palm Coast area. Your Navigator can help chart your course through treatment, answer your questions and connect you with the services and support you need.

Orthopedic Care
You Can Count On
Our skilled and compassionate team of orthopedic surgeons, sports medicine specialists and expert providers is here to help you regain your strength and confidence to move through life with less pain and more ease.
Find an Orthopedic Provider
Where You’ll Be
Treated Like a Pro
When you choose the AdventHealth network of care, you’ll have access to some of the official team doctors of our partner organizations. From leading sports medicine experts to primary care providers who specialize in whole-person health care for athletes, our team of professionals is ready to provide the pro-level care you deserve.
More About Our Partnerships
We Focus on the Details So
You Can Focus on Recovery
The recovery journey from orthopedic surgery like a knee, shoulder or hip replacement takes more than rest and physical therapy exercises. It requires mental effort, too. But don’t worry; we’re here to handle the details. We’ll connect you with rehabilitation resources, support groups and even help you find a fitness center. We take care of the recovery-to-do list so that you can focus on regaining your mobility and reclaiming your life.

About this Event
Participants will engage in exercises and movements to improve balance and coordination, strengthen lower body muscles, and increase confidence. Each class incorporates sitting, standing, and walking balance exercises to improve balance and reduce the fear of falling.
Fall 2025 Session 1 includes seven classes meeting
Thursdays, 10:00am - 11:00am
9/4/2025- 10/16/2025
Meets once per week, can drop into individual classes mid-session. Each session is $35 (or $5 per class to drop in), payment to be made online or by cash/check at first class

Cardiology in Palm Coast
Request an Appointment

Español
View Page Navigation
You Can Have Faith in
Our Heart Care Team
A properly functioning heart strengthens the whole body. But when it isn’t working as it should, it can impact your entire well-being. That’s why we’ve designed a robust and interconnected heart and vascular program to treat conditions ranging from mild discomfort to advanced heart disease.
Here in Flagler County, our AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway hospital expands on the capabilities of our sister hospital in Palm Coast and allows our heart care teams to see more patients right where they live and work.
We’re here to help you find the right cardiologist or a location that’s convenient for you.
Request an Appointment
Hide
We’re Here to
Strengthen Your Heart
5 items. To interact with these items, press Control-Option-Shift-Right Arrow
Expand All
Collapse All
Risk Factors for Heart Conditions
Some risk factors for cardiovascular disease, like your age or family history, you can’t control. But by better caring for yourself through lifestyle changes like your diet, you can lower your risk effectively. Your cardiac care team will work with you to discover all the ways you can reduce your risk of heart disease and stroke. Our goal is simple: to heal your body, engage your mind and lift your spirit.
Care Begins With a Diagnosis
Chest pain can be a warning sign of a more serious cardiovascular issue. That’s where we come in. Our experienced cardiologists in Palm Coast will conduct an initial screening to diagnose your condition and provide the answers you deserve.
Your initial screening may include the following tests:
24-hour Holter monitoring
Cardiac magnetic resonance imaging (MRI)
Computed tomography (CT) scans
Diagnostic cardiac catheterizations
Echo tests
Electrocardiograms (EKG)
Nuclear cardiology
Stress tests
X-rays
Our cardiac care team can diagnose and treat a range of cardiovascular conditions, including:
Arrhythmias
Atrial fibrillation (AFib)
Chest pain
Congestive heart failure
Endocarditis
Heart attack
Heart valve disease
Myocarditis
Vascular disease
Together, we'll work with you to develop a personalized treatment plan that addresses your unique condition, needs and health goals.
Advanced Care for Better Outcomes
From rapid-response care to advanced therapies that reduce recovery times, the comprehensive cardiovascular program at our hospital is designed to meet all of your heart care needs.
Below are just a few of the heart disease treatments and services offered by our cardiovascular specialists:
Ablation
Arterial bypass
Cardioversion
Carotid artery surgery
Coronary angioplasty
Heart failure treatments
Implantable cardioverter defibrillator
Interventional cardiac catheterization
Loop recorder implantation
Pacemakers
Percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI)
Stenting
After your procedure, our cardiovascular rehabilitation program offers customized exercise therapies designed for your specific heart problem and led by a registered nurse and exercise physiologist.
World-Class Care for Our Flagler Community
You’re a friend. A neighbor. And our greatest reward is seeing you live an active and healthy life. It’s why we provide free health services to the community, including nutritional counseling, wellness centers and physician-led seminars on heart health. And why we offer classes that help you quit smoking and reduce stress.
Recognized Stroke Care That Saves Lives
A stroke requires immediate attention. You need a dependable care team capable of springing into action when every moment counts, and that’s what you’ll find here. If you or a loved one suspects a stroke, come to our
AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway emergency room
for immediate care.
Expand All
Collapse All
Cardiovascular Physicians
Who Put Your Heart First
We’re here to take care of your cardiovascular system, so you can keep putting your whole heart into everything you do. Find the right Palm Coast cardiologist or vascular specialist near you today.
Find a Cardiovascular Expert
Trust Your Care to a Center of Excellence
Blood clots affect up to 900,000 Americans annually and cause up to 100,000 deaths, but many cases can be prevented with the right care. Our AdventHealth Palm Coast and AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway hospitals are recognized as Venous Thromboembolism (VTE) Centers of Excellence™. Both hospitals meet rigorous national standards for patient care, including quick diagnosis, seamless team coordination and post-discharge safety.
Wholehearted Care
for a
Lifetime
Breaking down barriers to better heart health. That’s what multidisciplinary heart and vascular care means to us. From helping with medication management to supporting your rehabilitation progress, our approach to care is simple: We’re here to help you get from where you are now to where you want to be.

About this Event
Breastfeeding is natural, but not like breathing; more like learning to walk. It takes time, practice, and there may be a few bumps along the way.
Many moms prepare for breastfeeding prenatally by taking breastfeeding classes and reading everything they can find about how to breastfeed. This is very important, but you never truly know what to expect until you get home with your baby. The Baby Place at AdventHealth Daytona Beach is here to help you with your breastfeeding experience.
Our Baby Bunch breastfeeding support group meets every Monday from 1:30pm - 3:30pm to offer moms the opportunity to ask questions and gain assistance from an IBCLC- Lactation Consultant in a small group setting. Baby Bunch provides a space for moms to connect with other breastfeeding moms so they can discuss highs and lows of their breastfeeding journey and share any challenges that they are experiencing. You will also have the opportunity to weigh and record your baby’s weight so you can see the positive results of all of your hard work. This group is for moms with babies age newborn to 12 months old. Baby Bunch is offered in person and is free to attend. Registration is recommended.
Please join our Facebook page- Baby Bunch of Daytona Beach for more information!
﻿
For more information, please contact
paula.meek@adventhealth.com

Let Our Team Put You at Ease
Getting blood lab work done can feel unnerving. But no need to feel faint; our experienced, caring team will put you at ease. Our laboratory services are performed by a dedicated team led by board-certified pathologists committed to delivering answers to your questions and solutions for your wellness.
Our Lab Services
We’re expanding the wide range of lab services from our sister hospital, AdventHealth Palm Coast, to a second location close to you, right in the heart of downtown Palm Coast. Here at AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway, our expert laboratory team will get the answers you need so that your care team can make an accurate diagnosis and form a treatment plan, so you can begin working toward recovery.
Some of the lab tests and screenings we offer include:
Blood bank
Chemistry
Cytology
Drug testing
Hematology
Histology
Microbiology
Special chemistry
Urinalysis
Some tests require you to come in with an empty stomach, so we open our labs early. We aim to see you quickly and let you get back to your day with as few interruptions as possible.
Lab Hours
Our AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway laboratory hours are 6 am to 4 pm, Monday through Friday. The lab at the Parkway Medical Plaza is open Monday through Friday, 6 am to 2:30 pm, and is closed daily for lunch from 12 to 12:30 pm. For more information, call
386-586-1732
.

Hospital Lab Services Delivering
the
Answers You Need
When it comes to our health, no one likes to wait. At our AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway hospital in Flagler County, quick and accurate lab work is our promise to you. Our trained and accredited lab technicians are ready to care for you with leading-edge lab testing, including complete blood count (CBC panels) and TSH blood tests, to help you and your
primary care physicians
better understand your health. With a focus on accuracy and getting results quickly, you can rest assured that you’ll get the treatment and care you deserve.
We’re here to help you find the lab location that’s convenient for you.

Sports Medicine and Rehab
Sports Medicine and Rehab in Palm Coast
Request an Appointment
Our Services
Find Doctors
Español
View Page Navigation
Get Back to
the Life You Love
The human body has astonishing potential. With a new location in the heart of downtown, our AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway team of sports medicine and rehabilitation experts is your partner in reaching it.
We provide outpatient services for orthopedic and sports medicine therapy, as well pediatric therapy which encompasses neurological rehab for physical, occupational and speech therapy. We also partner with AdventHealth Palm Coast to provide outpatient rehab services for neurological disorders, as well specialized cancer care through our lymphedema program. In addition, both AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway and AdventHealth Palm Coast will provide inpatient services.
We take a multidisciplinary approach to rehabilitation to help you heal fully — in body, mind and spirit — after an injury or illness.
We’re here to help you find the right physical therapist or a location that’s convenient for you.

Rehab Care Starts Here

Expand All
Collapse All
Rehab With Collaborative Care and Experts at Your Side
You love your active, independent life. So when injuries happen, you need a sports rehab team committed to your whole-person health — care that strengthens your body and eases your mind and spirit.
Our AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway team is here to help you get back to it with expert and compassionate care for your body, mind and spirit.
Your team may include the following:
Dietitians or nutritionists
Occupational therapists
Orthopedic specialists
Orthopedic surgeons
Pediatric therapists
Physical therapists
Rehabilitation technicians
Speech pathologists
Your Personal Rehab Program
Your needs are unique, so you need a care plan designed just for you. The first step in your recovery is determining a plan that suits you best. Whether that means outpatient care, inpatient care or surgery, your team will create a detailed plan specifically for you.
We offer a wide range of treatments and services, including:
Cancer rehabilitation
Complete decongestive therapy (CDT) for lymphedema management
Hip replacement surgery
Neurological rehabilitation
Occupational therapy
Orthopedic surgery
Orthopedics and sports medicine rehabilitation
Pediatric rehabilitation
Physical therapy
Shoulder surgery
Speech therapy
Stroke rehabilitation
Vestibular rehabilitation
Tests and Screenings for Smart Prevention
Physical activity provides countless benefits for our bodies, minds and spirits. Prevention is the first step to staying mobile and doing the activities you love.
Our specialists can help you spot abnormalities before they impact your well-being through a range of screenings and services, including:
Bone densitometry tests
Colonoscopies
Computed tomography (CT) scans
Diagnostic X-rays
Fluoroscopies
Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) scans
Ultrasounds
You want to stay active and embrace each day with excitement and independence. Let us help.
Helping Kids and Young Adults Thrive
Our pediatric outpatient rehabilitation team is committed to helping your child develop, grow and reach their potential.
Some of the conditions we care for include:
Attention-deficit disorder (ADD) and attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD)
Autism spectrum disorders
Cerebral palsy
Developmental delays
Down syndrome
Feeding difficulties
Hearing or vision impairment
Neurologic disorders
Orthopedic injuries
Speech and language delays
Our specialized pediatric rehab services include:
Augmentative and alternative communication system training
Modified barium swallow studies
Neuro-developmental treatments (NDTs)
Pediatric feeding
Picture Exchange Communication System® (PECS®)
Sensory integration therapy
Sona-speech therapy
Speech, occupational or physical therapy
Our dedicated pediatric rehabilitation center is available in conjunction with PT Solutions and is located close to our hospital facility.
Recognized and Accredited Care in Your Community
We’re committed to providing Palm Coast with the best rehabilitation services possible. Upholding the highest standards in clinical excellence has earned our sister facility, AdventHealth Palm Coast Inpatient Rehab, full accreditation by both The Joint Commission and The Commission on Accreditation of Rehabilitation Facilities (CARF) for Comprehensive Rehabilitation and Stroke Specialty.
Expand All
Collapse All
Get Ready to
Get Moving Again
You’ve got this because you’ve got us. Get the care and support you need to get back in the game. Explore our network of Palm Coast physical therapy providers and sports med and rehab experts near you.
Find a Provider
From Treatment to Recovery:
A Customized Playbook
It’s a balancing act: you want to re-engage in your active life, but you also need to slow down and heal. We’re here to help you stay on a safe and steady course to recovery. Using your customized care plan as their guide, our multidisciplinary team will connect you to the medical professionals, community resources and local support services you need to help you get back to doing the things you love.

Services
Men’s Health Care
Men’s Health Care in Flagler
A New Place for
Men’s
Health Care
With a new location in the heart of downtown, our AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway hospital is your partner in whole-person health care. Feeling your best goes hand in hand with living well, and caring for your physical body fuels your mind and spirit. Our team is ready to support every aspect of your health, from disease prevention to early detection to proactive treatment.
We look at the whole picture, including your daily habits, pastimes, nutrition and even how you’re sleeping. Plus, we’ll help you assess your risks for heart disease, Type 2 diabetes and colon cancers. At every age and every stage of life, we’ll be here to guide you through your health and wellness decisions.
We’re here to help you find the right physician or a location that’s convenient for you.

Men’s Health Screenings
Smart prevention is key to staying healthy in body, mind and spirit. Our men’s health care team at AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway wants to help you stay on track with the care men need, from blood tests to check for Type 2 diabetes or high cholesterol to screenings for colon cancer.
Not knowing won’t make it go away, so
schedule an appointment
today to take charge of your health. Being confident in your wellness starts with being in the know. We’re here to help.
The Care Men Need
Maintaining whole-person wellness takes energy, persistence and a partnership with a skilled team of men’s health care experts ready to address your needs and concerns.
Our primary care physicians and men’s health specialists use the most advanced diagnostic tools for common health concerns in men, including:
Diabetes
Heart and vascular issues
Kidney stones and disease
Orthopedics and sports medicine needs
Osteoporosis
Stroke prevention and treatment
A Connected Network of Care
You’re a connected system: body, mind and spirit. And so are we. With a multidisciplinary approach to care, we reach across specialties and locations to give you the support you need to thrive. You can count on us to listen to you, respect your time, compare notes and make treatment decisions that meet your unique needs and goals. No matter what’s on your chart or your mind, we’re here for you every step of the way.

Men’s Health Screenings
Smart prevention is key to staying healthy in body, mind and spirit. Our men’s health care team at AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway wants to help you stay on track with the care men need, from blood tests to check for Type 2 diabetes or high cholesterol to screenings for colon cancer.
Not knowing won’t make it go away, so
schedule an appointment
today to take charge of your health. Being confident in your wellness starts with being in the know. We’re here to help.
The Care Men Need
Maintaining whole-person wellness takes energy, persistence and a partnership with a skilled team of men’s health care experts ready to address your needs and concerns.
Our primary care physicians and men’s health specialists use the most advanced diagnostic tools for common health concerns in men, including:
Diabetes
Heart and vascular issues
Kidney stones and disease
Orthopedics and sports medicine needs
Osteoporosis
Stroke prevention and treatment
A Connected Network of Care
You’re a connected system: body, mind and spirit. And so are we. With a multidisciplinary approach to care, we reach across specialties and locations to give you the support you need to thrive. You can count on us to listen to you, respect your time, compare notes and make treatment decisions that meet your unique needs and goals. No matter what’s on your chart or your mind, we’re here for you every step of the way.

A New Place for
Men’s
Health Care
With a new location in the heart of downtown, our AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway hospital is your partner in whole-person health care. Feeling your best goes hand in hand with living well, and caring for your physical body fuels your mind and spirit. Our team is ready to support every aspect of your health, from disease prevention to early detection to proactive treatment.
We look at the whole picture, including your daily habits, pastimes, nutrition and even how you’re sleeping. Plus, we’ll help you assess your risks for heart disease, Type 2 diabetes and colon cancers. At every age and every stage of life, we’ll be here to guide you through your health and wellness decisions.
We’re here to help you find the right physician or a location that’s convenient for you.

Senior Care
Senior Care in Downtown Palm Coast
A New Place for
Compassionate Elder Care
Meet your new partner in healthy aging. Our AdventHealth Palm Coast Parkway hospital brings age-related care closer to home for this season of your life. Our geriatricians are ready to support every aspect of your health, from disease prevention to early detection and proactive treatment. Let our compassionate specialists help you and your caregivers navigate this unique chapter with confidence. It’s our privilege to care for you.
We’re here to help you find doctors for seniors or a location that’s convenient for you.
Request an Appointment
Hide
Elder Care That
Helps You Feel Whole
3 items. To interact with these items, press Control-Option-Shift-Right Arrow
Expand All
Collapse All
Senior Care That’s Personal
Your experience begins the moment you enter our doors, which is why we aim to put you at ease with our calm, quiet welcome centers. We’ll ask you questions, not just to understand your health concerns, but also to get to know your habits and state of mind.
Our comprehensive approach to geriatrics and wellness accounts for every aspect of your life, including your physical, mental, emotional, social and spiritual well-being. And since no two people are exactly alike, your care plan — which may include physical therapy, counseling, nutrition and other lifestyle adjustments — will be uniquely yours.
Preventing Illness With Early Detection
Our trained, compassionate geriatric care team is ready to assist you in understanding your body’s evolving needs. Testing helps us identify abnormalities and areas of concern. We offer screenings like:
Blood pressure tests
Bone density scans
Cancer screenings
Cholesterol tests
Geriatric medicine evaluations
Hearing tests
Memory screening for dementia and Alzheimer's
Type 2 diabetes blood testing
Experts Who Care
We're here to lean in, listen and help you strengthen your whole health. As you age, you might face new issues like arthritis, diabetes or memory concerns. You can count on us for kindness, understanding and the respect you deserve. Our doctors, clinicians, home health nurses and pharmacists work hand in hand with you and your family to create a clear, effective care plan.
Within our network, we can connect you to recovery and rehabilitation services along the full continuum of care, including:
Chaplain services
Durable medical equipment rentals
Home health care
Hospice care
Inpatient rehabilitation
Outpatient rehabilitation
Nursing home care
Long-term acute care
Wellness centers with senior activities

About AdventHealth Gordon
Your Home for
Whole-Person Wellness
Discover a hospital in Calhoun, Georgia, where you'll find exceptional care and innovative technology in a warm, community-focused setting. At AdventHealth Gordon, formerly Gordon Hospital, we deliver a variety of hospital services and emergency care, all with a focus on your whole health. And beyond our hospital doors, we extend our mission throughout our community, supporting various initiatives that make everyday wellness accessible for all of our neighbors.
Welcoming Everyone
Who Supports You
Friends, family and caregivers are warmly invited to visit and spend time with patients at our Gordon County hospital. Find out more information about AdventHealth Gordon below.
Information for Patients
Information for Caregivers
Information for Visitors
AdventHealth Gordon,
Formerly Gordon Hospital
When the AdventHealth network of care united under one name, Gordon Hospital became AdventHealth Gordon. We're honored to continue serving our Gordon County community with whole-person care.
Our Values
5 items. To interact with these items, press Control-Option-Shift-Right Arrow
Quality and Service Excellence
We consistently deliver exceptional care and strive for excellence in all we do.
Community and Well-being
We’re committed to improving the health, prosperity and well-being of the communities we serve.
High Ethical Standards
We’re called to uphold the highest standards, with integrity driving every decision we make and every action we take.
Stewardship
We’re guided by relentless stewardship in the management of the resources entrusted to us.
Inclusiveness
We celebrate the diverse backgrounds, cultures and experiences of our patients, visitors and colleagues, and embrace opportunities to learn and grow from new perspectives.
Moving Forward as
AdventHealth Gordon
We know that the Gordon Hospital name was a cornerstone in the Gordon County community. As AdventHealth Gordon, we continue our legacy of providing whole-person care that heals the body, eases the mind and lifts the spirit.
Our hospital employs over 1,300 team members, provides 22 types of care and partners with local businesses and organizations to help our community thrive.
We strive to create an environment that promotes true healing and good health at every age and life stage. That's why we provide the caring expertise of the top physicians, nurses and medical teams, so you and your family get the best medical care possible through these services and more.
